answers.answer: A graph that plots a marker to representing two different values associated with each data point
A graph that shows the frequency distribution of some data
answers.feedback: No. Histograms are used to show the frequency distribution of data

answers.answer: A graph that shows the statistics of some data
answers.feedback: Scatter plots show the data values directly, rather than statistics of the data

question: What is a histogram? (Choose all correct answers.)

answers.answer: A graph that visualizes how some data is distributed
A graph that shows the relationship between two variables
answers.feedback: The one-dimensional histograms we discuss in this section only provide information about one variable of a data set

answers.answer: A graph that plots a marker for each data point
answers.feedback: Histograms do not use markers and do not produce separate graphics for each data point

answers.answer: A specialized type of bar graph
